alert.note: Alert for Bell; Harlan; Leslie; Letcher; Perry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 11:50PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Harlan, southeastern Bell, southeastern Leslie, southwestern Letcher and southeastern Perry Counties through 1245 AM EST... At 1149 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fonde, or near Middlesboro, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Middlesboro, Hutch, Ferndale, Meldrum, Noetown and Binghamtown around 1155 PM EST. Calvin and Ponza around 1200 AM EST. Varilla and Oaks around 1205 AM EST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Miracle, Cubage, Balkan, Callaway, Black Snake, Blackmont, Molus, Pathfork, Wallins Creek, Coldiron, Kentenia, Liggett, Tacky Town and Hensley Store. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
